author: Lon.TV
description:
Buy one at Stoneage Gamer:  https://lon.tv/89o4h (compensated affiliate link) - When we looked at the Summercart the other day I noted my N64 controller wasn't working great and my controller pak was dead. This BlueRetro device works with most modern bluetooth controllers and adds save game controller pak support along with rumble! See more Summercart review: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ipPGFyPAqkY and subscribe! http://lon.tv/s  -- Additionally it works with mice and other peripherals for N64DD too. 

Find them also at Amazon -  https://lon.tv/bc9o7 (compensated affiliate link)

See more Retro gaming: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLCZHp4d1HnIswkmY7xCvaH3K_78rUsEIO

VIDEO INDEX:
00:00 - Intro
00:48 - Xbox Controller Demo
01:59 - Price
02:14 - How to use
02:39 - Need one for each port / power concerns?
03:06 - Controller compatibility
03:29 - Default button map
04:28 - Input lag?
05:00 - Configuration with web browser
05:39 - Backing up controller pak data
10:22 - Bluetoot
title: Dusting off the Nintendo 64 Part 2! Modern controllers with the BlueRetro Adapter!
